name: Hides Hotel
description:
Located in the heart of vibrant Cairns city centre, Hides Hotel is your main hub to explore the city’s many attractions.
 
Its position allows a leisurely 6 minute stroll to the Cairns Esplanade, Night Markets, Reef Fleet Terminal and is steps away from the local heritage Museum.

The local casino and recently opened Cairns Aquarium is also a short walking distance.

Tours to the world-famous Great Barrier Reef, Daintree Rainforest, Kuranda Scenic Railway, Port Douglas and Cape Tribulation can be arranged directly with the Hides Hotel Tour Desk. 

Enjoy the newly re-furbished (Oct 2018) hotel rooms at affordable rates. All hotel rooms are ensuite, air conditioned and include a small refrigerator, tea/coffee facilities and TV. Free Wi-fi is also included. There are a variety of room types to cater to families and groups of friends. 

Reception available 24 hours, however code access is required between 10pm-6am. Code is given on check in.

Check in is 2pm, check out is 10am. Please see reception staff if you would like to pay for early check in / late check out.

A $100 bond is required on check in – Pre-Authorization Card. This is released day of departure, provided there are no incidental or other charges to be covered.

We do not allow room parties, and it is expected that all guests are respectful of the hotel, its guests and staff.

All damages must be paid for.

We ask that our guests help us help the environment, and turn off lights and air conditioning when not needed.



Guest Laundry is open 7am – 9pm.

Children must be accompanied by adult.

Management reserves the right to allow or disallow guests or visitors from the Hotel, in the interest of comfort and safety for all

Explore Cairns from the best location in town!

houseRules.notes:
Reception available 24 hours, however code access is required between 10pm-6am. Code is given on check in.

Check in is 2pm, check out is 10am. Please see reception staff if you would like to pay for early check in / late check out.

A $100 bond is required on check in - payable in Cash or Card. This is refunded at check out, provided there are no incidental or other charges to be covered.

We do not allow room parties, and it is expected that all guests are respectful of the hotel, its guests and staff.

All damages must be paid for.

We ask that our guests help us help the environment, and turn off lights and air conditioning when not needed.

Swimming pool is open 7am - 9pm

Guest Laundry is open 7am - 9pm.

Children must be accompanied by adult.

Management reserves the right to allow or disallow guests or visitors from the Hotel, in the interest of comfort and safety for all
